src:
Twitter OVO Diserbu Pengguna Gara-gara Mau Ada Biaya Transfer
04 Nov 2019, 05:00 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Foto: ovo

Jakarta - Layanan e-wallet atau dompet digital OVO berencana memberlakukan tarif untuk pengiriman uang ke bank sebesar Rp 2.500 pada 12 Desember mendatang. Sejumlah pengguna ramai menanyakan kabar tersebut ke akun twitter resmi @ovo_id. Misalnya akun @thurs*ay*ca*y menanyakan "Per 12 Desember @ovo_id udah gak gratisin biaya transfer ke rekening bank ya?"Kemudian akun @yoe*ie*s juga menanyakan pengenaan biaya transfer. "@ovo_id Ramai berita tentang trfer ke bank dengan ovo ada biaya Rp 2.500 , sedangkan saya belum mengerti cara trnfer ke bank. Apakh cm akun premier yg dapat digunakan trf?,"Lalu akun @ang*ib*rn*k*le menyampaikan keluh kesahnya ke OVO. "Yodah gpp deh kalo cm 2.500 walaupun syedi karna akutu pengguna setia ovo," Selanjutnya ada akun @blu**is*a "Wow. Baiklah @ovo_id kita sudah menjalani masa masa yg menyenangkan. Goodbye," Akun @de*ip*iy*n*o "Tanpa Layanan Transfer Bank Gratis...@ovo_id Sangat Kurang Bersahabat Lagi.... Awas User Banyak Yang Lari Cari Layanan E-wallet Yang Masih Ada Fitur Tfr Bank Gratis," Menanggapi cuitan-cuitan itu, admin @ovo_id menjawab jika biaya transfer masih lebih hemat dibandingkan dengan bank."Hi Kak, jangan khawatir ya Kak transfer ke semua bank pake OVO masih hemat, hanya biaya Rp2.500/transfer berlaku mulai 12 Desember 2019, tetap mudah dan praktis ya Kak dalam bertransaksi menggunakan OVO. Terima kasih," tulis balasan twit tersebut dikutip detikcom.Simak Video "Rudiantara Semringah Sambut OVO Jadi Unicorn Kelima Indonesia"[Gambas:Video 20detik](kil/fdl)
text:
Twitter OVO Is Invaded by Users Because There Is A Transfer Fee
Nov. 04, 2019, 5:00 AM by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Photo: ovo

Jakarta - OVO e-wallet service plans to impose a tariff for sending money to banks at Rp 2,500 on 12 December. A number of users were busy asking for the news to the official Twitter account @ovo_id. For example, the account @ thurs * ay * ca * y asks "As of December 12, @ovo_id, is there no fee for transferring to a bank account?" Then the account @ yoe * ie * s also asks for the transfer fee. "@ovo_id There is a lot of news about transferring to the bank with Ovo, there is a fee of Rp. 2,500, whereas I don't understand how to transfer to the bank. Is it the premiere account that can be used?" the problem to OVO. "Yodah is not gpp if 2,500 cm is even though it is available because of loyal users of ovo," Then there is an account @ blu ** is * a "Wow. Alright @ovo_id we've had a good time. Goodbye," @ de * ip * iy account * n * o "Without a Free Bank Transfer Service ... @ ovo_id Very Less Friendly Again ... Beware Many Users are Running to Find E-Wallet Services That Still Have a Free Tfr Bank Feature," Responding to the tweets, admin @ ovo_id answered if the transfer fee is still more efficient compared to the bank. "Hi Sis, don't worry, Sis transfer to all banks using OVO is still saving, only Rp. 2,500 / transfer applies starting December 12, 2019, it's still easy and practical, bro. using OVO. Thank you, "wrote the tweet reply quoted detikcom. Watch the video" Rudiantara Semringah Welcomes OVO Becomes the Fifth Unicorn of Indonesia "[Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (kil / fdl)
